Text: RE recruiting career guidance counselor Cc As I am out of town James Baker in our office is running the book on Eric He will coordinate with you Thank you both for the help Truly full service investment banking Best regards Russell L Sherrill office UBS Warburg Louisiana Suite Houston TX fax Original Message From mailto Sent Friday February PM To Sherrill Russell Subject RE recruiting career guidance counselor I will be in town Monday and Tuesday Out WedFri in Florida I will definitely help on Monday andor Tuesday I can make arrangements for backups later in the week if necessary Let me know Original Message From Sherrill Russell ENRON mailtoSherrill Russell ENRON Sent Fri PM To Presto Kevin M Cc Baker James Subject recruiting career guidance counselor Could you meet with the son of a client on the captioned item Hell be here the week of Feb th Im out of town I dont yet know the dates He is Eric Fabrikant son of Charles Chrm CEO of Seacor Smit NYSE CKH Eric wants to be in the Energy business and is meeting several execs that week Yes you could be one I would appreciate your help Best regards Russell L Sherrill office UBS Warburg Louisiana Suite Houston TX fax Visit our website at This message contains confidential information and is intended only for the individual named If you are not the named addressee you should not disseminate distribute or copy this email RE UBSEnron trading grouppst thanks will pass it on Best regards Russell L Sherrill office UBS Warburg Louisiana Suite Houston TX fax Original Message From mailto Sent Friday February PM To Sherrill Russell Subject RE UBSEnron trading group Gas or Power Gas is Scott Neal and Power is Doug GilbertSmith for ERCOT TX and Fletch Sturm for LAAL Gulf Coast The Williams energy traders know these folks so these questions must be coming from noncommodity people at Williams Original Message From Sherrill Russell ENRON Sent Friday February AM To Presto Kevin M Subject FW UBSEnron trading group kevin Called you on another topic so please still call this afternoon Do you have an answer to the following Best regards Russell L Sherrill office UBS Warburg Louisiana Suite Houston TX fax Original
